body_html: I of course would like to get rid of redundancy, however there is always a tradeoff. While it is true that deprecation helps make changes more graceful, it does not make them zero cost for users. It just defers that cost to a potentially more convenient time in the future instead of forcing it immediately. We are thinking about deprecating it, but I don't know when that will happen.

body: I of course would like to get rid of redundancy, however there is always a tradeoff. While it is true that deprecation helps make changes more graceful, it does not make them zero cost for users. It just defers that cost to a potentially more convenient time in the future instead of forcing it immediately. We are thinking about deprecating it, but I don't know when that will happen.
